channel.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]YanilleScape ![/size]
[Classic 317] - YanilleVille! [Vs1] - YanilleWorld! [Vs2] - YanillePkUnleashed! [Vs3] (Unknown to release) YanilleReloaded!
[size=18pt]Development Team Needed[/size]
About us, We're a server about eco, pking, and skilling. So leave all the drama behind. We are not yet done making the server so I can't really put much about the server.
[size=12pt]The Applying Layout, Name: Ingame Name: (Applying For) EXPERIENCE: How can I contact you: [/size]
Staff list (Max Staff #16) Owner(s) - Panda(Me), Jack, (Bryce)
Co-Owner(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Head Admin(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Admin(s) - , (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Moderator(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot) ---------------------------------------------------------- Coder(s) - Panda(Me), Jack, Bryce
Server Programmer(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Server Developer(s)[Backup Coder] - (Open Slot)
Host(s) - Jack, Jack
Tester(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Suggester(s) - (Open Slot), (Open Slot), (Open Slot)
Forum Specialist(s) - Jack, (Open Slot)
etc, Just apply and say what you wanna be. Me, Bryce, And Jack must agree to hire you.
Don't get your hopes up, I'm not recruiting all staff. If you wan't staff in-game you must show me you enhanced skill's.
__________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________ Apply now or you'll miss all the fun!
__________________________________________________________________________ I was inspired to make a RSPS, and now here I am, making a server!
__________________________________________________________________________ Any Suggestions Please Comment Below, On Page 2 ..
CREDIT'S 45% ThrillScape, 55% To my Staff, We changed it all... We are not yet finished..
[UNDER CONSTRUCTION] IF YOU WANNA HELP US OUT WE WILL LET YOU JOIN SERVER EARLY TO HELP TEST STUFF AND FIND BUGS.. REWARD WILL BE A ITEM... WE DON'T KNOW WHAT ITEM... BUT A ITEM!

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @nikkidespard nikkidespard
item.description:
@nikkidespard wrote:

I can host on a strong server, stress tested, can hold 750k. Also DDOS protected. Contact Skype: Jackhampson

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @pkerzscap3 pkerzscap3
item.description:
@pkerzscap3 wrote:

I can host, add me on skype, MoistPenguinz. I could host bost worlds, actually. Add me on skype.

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

They are legit.

whats that rod want to join the classic project?

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

… Then If I Hire you, Can I pay you in Donations Starting next month… Because Inrl I Don’t have 500 To give away…

yes pm me your email and update me on top as coder and ill be on in a few hours we can start right away

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

Nevermind, I do not want to have bussiness with you, I’m hiring "I’m_Nota_Bot"or somthing… I’m not getting sued…

not a bot is a good coder he will most definitely provide your player with viruses and botnets great choice bro might as well higher snoopy well your at it

look bro i am not greedy we will make it 200 send 100 now to wrongsectionthisisrunescapeclassic.com and pay me other half when server is up and running with 2000+ players

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

500? That’s if I get enough donations, I’m not going to pay with my money for other people to see some cool pixels… I rather save and buy me a car… So I’ll let you take some $$ out of donations…

do you want the best rsc ever with 100 percent working skills and a player base of 2000 + then that’s my price

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

I’m so confused, I just need a development team and I’m willing to pay… I will soon fix the paying prices in the future if that’s to low/high… Please help me by making a forums so I can start posting in there… Then I’m going to need to make a client…

ill tell you what i am the best coder out here at the time lets say you give me 500 a month and will call it good?

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

If I code and host then I’ll be getting 2/4 plus 1/4 if I then donate 1/4 in donations do I get another 1/4?

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

rofl no thats too generous mate. I’ll host for 1/4 and coad for $5 ez (go on irc.rizon.net and find Eddie on #projectrsc)

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

how much is the pay? per hour are fix rate? need me to do some apps as well???

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team Needed! [317]
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

I hope you know this is RuneScape Classic development.

If you’re aware of that, good luck.

Read full topic
